SCOBuilder - Class in bridge.toolkit.commands
Builds the launchable learning resources (SCOs) from the DMs found in the SCPM.

SCPM_FILE - Static variable in class bridge.toolkit.util.Keys
String that represents the location of the S1000D SCPM file that is being converted into a SCORM Content Package.
searchForAttribute(List<Element>, String, String) - Method in class bridge.toolkit.util.XMLParser
Loops through all the elements in the XML file and finds the desired element and value of the searched Attribute.
